thread.section_title: Hotel du Prince Eugene - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great little hotel in the 11th arrondissement
thread.title_full: Great little hotel in the 11th arrondissement - Review of Hotel du Prince Eugene, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Edo Z
title: Great little hotel in the 11th arrondissement
text:
Super friendly staff, well kept and very convenient little hotel. It is located in the 11th arrondissement, away from the hustle and bustle of central Paris, in an animated neighbourhood with plenty of life and local restaurants and shops.
Our room, 604, was a tad small, but warm, quiet and comfortable.
I'd definitely come back if the chance arises.
